Summary: Saw object in sky with bright pulsating orange light which moved to the west.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Santa Cruz
There was one other sighting in Santa Cruz on or around July 4th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsOn 4th of July, a friend told me to come outside my home because he thought he sighted a a UFO. I went out side and watched this object in the sky that was pulsating a bright orange light. At first, I thought it was a satellite It moved toward the west. I lost sight of the object when it went behind some clouds. I felt amazed to see such a sight.
